Package ch.nolix.element.geometry

Class _2DPoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.nolix.element.core.Element
      • ch.nolix.element.geometry._2DPoint
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Typed, TypeRequestable, Specified, IElement

    public final class _2DPoint
extends Element
    A 2D point is a point with 2 coordinates that are called x-coordinate and y-coordinate. A 2D point is not mutable.
    Author:
    Silvan Wyss
